fixed_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 33.1/34.8/36.4% of Attack + 1001/1239/1495.

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 106.2/111.5/116.8% of Attack. 59.0/62.0/64.9% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Bufu

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 2.9%. After healing, restore user's SP by 2.

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 2.9%. After healing, restore user's SP by 3.
passive_skill.name: Essence of Love I

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
